entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lucky Lake 11:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -15.7°C
Wind: SSE 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Snow mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Blowing snow at times overnight. Wind south 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
